Title: Remote Commands
Description: Program which allow to control computer sending e-mails with commands.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The main aim of this project is to execute commands, received by e-mail.

For example: you want to get screen's print from computer. You just send letter to e-mail address(which was configured before) with only "ps" as mail text and ofter some time you will response letter with attached image file.

Program features:

  • Receiving\sending e-mails 
  • Executing wide range of commands: uploading\downloading files, starting torrents downloads, sending folder structure. Command list could be easily extended.
  • Suspending computer and waking it up in defined time.

Program consist of two project. One o them is lib project, which is doing all work: receiving\sending e-mails, executing commands, suspending\scheduling wake up. And the second one - UI project, written in WPF. So, if you want write your own UI or use RC in your own projects, you can easily do it by using only first project.
